contentrichtext.text: {{about|the game show|the video game|Buzz!: Quiz TV}} {{Unreferenced|date=June 2009}} '''''Quiz TV''''' was a popular British [[television]] interactive gameshow which screened on Digital satellite and cable TV from 14 June 2004 to 23 June 2006. It was a premium-line call-in show, viewers were encouraged to phone a [[Premium-rate telephone number|premium-rate number]] in order to provide an answer to a quiz question. [[Category:Television channels in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Defunct British television channels]] [[Category:Phone-in quiz shows]] {{UK-tv-prog-stub}} {{game-tv-prog-stub}}
